description: A blueprint for analyzing the content and elements of an advertisement image.

Frame_Sequence.instruction: The sequence of frames or images that make up the overall advertisement, from left to right and top to bottom.

Window_Frame.instruction: The type and design of the window frame visible in the image.

Outdoor_Setting.instruction: The outdoor environment or scenery visible through the window, such as greenery, natural elements, etc.

Narrative_Progression.instruction: The overall narrative or story being conveyed through the sequence of frames in the advertisement.
